headline: L3Harris, Dutch Ministry of Defence Sign FOXTROT Long-Term Agreement
summary: ROCHESTER, N.Y., March 31, 2025--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) has signed a long-term agreement with the Dutch Ministry of Defence for delivery of advanced Falcon® IV radios for the FOXTROT program. The agreement is valued up to 1 billion euros.

raw.headline: L3Harris, Dutch Ministry of Defence Sign FOXTROT Long-Term Agreement

headline: L3Harris Completes Sale of Commercial Aviation Solutions Business to TJC for $800 Million
summary: MELBOURNE, Fla., March 31, 2025--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) has completed the previously announced sale of its Commercial Aviation Solutions (CAS) business to an affiliate of TJC L.P. for $800 million. The entire $800 million cash purchase price was paid to L3Harris at the closing of the transaction.
